00029 class BSTException : public std::exception
00030 {
00031   public:
00032     BSTException(int ErrCode, const std::string& Message) :
00033       error_code_(ErrCode), message_(Message) {
00034     };
00035 
00036     virtual int code(void) const {
00037       return error_code_;
00038     }
00039     virtual const char *what(void) const throw(){
00040       return message_.c_str();
00041     }
00042     virtual ~BSTException() {}
00043     enum BST_EXCEPTION{E_DUPLICATE, E_NO_MEMORY};
00044 
00045   private:  
00046     int error_code_;
00047     std::string message_;
00048 };

00050 template <typename T>
00051 class BSTree
00052 {
00053   public:
00054     struct BinTreeNode
00055     {
00056       BinTreeNode *left;
00057       BinTreeNode *right;
00058       T data;
00059       int balance_factor; // optional
00060       unsigned count;    // number of nodes in subtree
00061       
00062       BinTreeNode(void) : left(0), right(0), data(0), balance_factor(0), count(0) {};
00063       BinTreeNode(const T& value) : left(0), right(0), data(value), balance_factor(0), count(0) {};
00064     };
00065     typedef BinTreeNode* BinTree;
00066 
00067     //BSTree(void);
00068     BSTree(ObjectAllocator *OA = 0, bool ShareOA = false);    
00069     BSTree(const BSTree& rhs);
00070     virtual ~BSTree();
00071     BSTree& operator=(const BSTree& rhs);
00072     const BinTreeNode* operator[](int index) const;
00073     virtual void insert(const T& value);
00074     virtual void remove(const T& value);
00075     void clear(void);
00076     bool find(const T& value, unsigned &compares) const;
00077     bool empty(void) const;
00078     unsigned int size(void) const;
00079     int height(void) const;
00080     BinTree root(void) const;
00081 
00082   protected:
00083     BinTree root_;
00084     unsigned int size_;
00085     ObjectAllocator* oa_;
00086     bool freeoa_;
00087     bool shareoa_;
00088     BinTree& get_root(void);
00089     BinTree make_node(const T& value);
00090     void free_node(BinTree node);
00091     int tree_height(BinTree tree) const;
00092     void find_predecessor(BinTree tree, BinTree &predecessor) const;
00093     bool find_node(BinTree tree, const T& value, unsigned &compares) const;
00094     int max(const int first, const int second) const;
00095     
00096   private:
00097     void delete_node(BinTree &tree, const T& value);
00098     void insert_node(BinTree &tree, const T& value);
00099     const BinTreeNode* find_index(BinTree tree, int index) const;
00100     void free_all_nodes(BinTree &tree);
00101     void copy_tree(BinTree &copy, BinTree tree);  
00102 };
